content: --श्लोक <ab>a.</ab> ‘well-spoken of’, or ‘auspicious to repeat or utter the name of,’ of good fame. (--कः an epithet of Nala, (of Niṣadha); Yudhiṣṭhira, and Janārdana; पुण्यश्लोको नलो राजा पुण्यश्लोको युद्धिष्ठिरः . पुण्यश्लोका च वेदेही पुण्यश्लोको जनार्दनः .. (--का) an epithet of Sītā and Draupadī
